mapper.insert: insert into auction (icategory, title, ctnt, iuser, buy, imbuy) values (#{icategory}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser}, #{buy}, #{imbuy})
mapper.select: select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.hits, A.images, A.ctnt , A.imbuy, A.buy, B.nm as writernm From auction A Left join lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser where A.isdel = 0 and A.icategory = ${icategory} Order by A.iboard DESC
